title: MyAssets App
paragraph: Most comprehensive tool for asset and financial management and analytics

cards.title: All-time modern technologies
cards.paragraph: The team + company made sure to provide and use modern techs for design, develop, test and deploy the totality of the project

cards.title: The Complexity
cards.paragraph: This must be the most complex yet interactive project I have worked on. Developing this project made me realized I've come a long way to write something complex, yet I'm still learning!

cards.title: Component-Based UI System
cards.paragraph: I introduced this concept to the team and the designer, as a designer before I also contributed on bridging UI with real-life development

cards.title: Lots of Graphs
cards.paragraph: Who would thought I would go back on studying Geometry just to decode/encode the logic behind the technology of D3.js graphs
